title: Magnificent Bastard
description: F*ck Prince Charming. Sometimes, you need a Magnificent B@stard.Face it, ladies: love sucks and then you cry…while your ex rides off into the sunset banging your best friend.But why let a break-up end in tears when it can end with sweet revenge? Enter Magnificent B Consulting and me, chief executive B. I’ve got it all—looks, brains, a heart of gold, and the fake dating instincts guaranteed to make your ex regret the day he said goodbye.With the help of my virtual assistant, I’ve built an empire giving broken-hearted women the vengeance they deserve. Life is a bowl of cherries, until my virtual assistant shows up on my real doorstep for the first time, begging for an intervention of her own.Damn… She’s a bona fide sex kitten.I pride myself on being a pro, but pretending to be her lover soon leads to so much more.So what’s my next move? Fight for the girl who makes me want to get on a white horse and ride to her rescue, or stay a Magnificent B to the end?Note: Fake Dating the Boss is a super sexy romantic comedy from the hero’s point of view. Lots of dirty talk. Ridiculous chemistry. Banter that qualifies as foreplay and a swoony HEA!
author: Lili Valente
